resources.string: Connect to the network and come back to us
Track tickets status, get draw results, and get notifications when you win!
Enter your phone number, we will send you an One Time Code on this number
To start using LISA\'s app please first confirm you are 18+ and agree to the Terms & Conditions

Play and Win you favorite games!
The existing LISA PIN is a 4 digits code already created on your cell phone
Place your finger on the device home button to verify your identity

Permission is not granted by user
Enter your existing LISA PIN code to securely access your account

Share the LISA experience by gifting funds to your friends to play!
Enter your Lisa PIN code to access transfer to your friend.
Enter your Mon cash PIN code to access cash out.
Enter Confirmation Code. Hold tight! \nThis might take a minute.
Your payment has been sent successfully!
Your transfer has been done successfully !
Your PIN code was successfully changed!
For PIN reset or for assistance please contact us
Would you like to delete this message ?
Here is a list of your actions
Select the language in the list below
Choose a game and dial the short code
Enter your existing LISA PIN code to securely access your account
Select the game section and bet on your next play!
Please fill out all mandatory fields
Current Selection - Press PLAY to confirm
Do you want to deactivate this subscription?
No message in your inbox, yet!
Please enter third COMBO combination number
New tickets are no longer available for this draw
Click ADD to put your ticket in your selection
Enter the 1 number and the bet you want to play for
Make sure wifi or cellular data is turned on
Your LISA account has been successfully recharged!
Customize your account to fit your preferences
The ticket list for the combo combination
To play Boloto choose 3 numbers for a chance to win the Jackopot
To play Bolet choose 1 number for a chance to win 50X 20X 10X your bet
Enter the 3 numbers you want to play
Enter the 1 number and the bet you want to play for
Combo6 option is a quicker way to play 6 possible game combinations
Click on the mark book to register the ticket to the automatic subscription
QuickPick is an option where the system will randomly select your numbers
Click on the bookmark to register the ticket to the automatic subscription
To play Maryaj choose 2 numbers for a chance to win 1,000X your bet
Enter the 2 numbers and the bet you want to play for
To play Lotto3 choose 3 digits for a chance to win 500X your bet
Combo is an option to play different combinations based on the numbers selected
Enter the 3 digits and the bet you want to play for
To play Lotto4 choose 4 digits for a chance to win 5,000X your bet
Enter the 4 digits and the bet you want to play for
To play Lotto5 choose 5 digits for a chance to win 25,000X your bet
Select the draw option you want to play or all 3 of them
To play Lotto5P5 choose 5 digits for a chance to win the jackpot
To play ROYAL5 choose 5 digits for a chance to win the jackpot
Enter the 5 digits you want to play for
You can either transfer your winnings to your Mon Cash account or retrieve your cash at one of SogeXpress who services LISA customers
Enter the 5 digits and the bet you want to play for
Make sure you are near by or inside a SogeXpress cabin while doing the transaction (request valid for 15 mins).\nMinimum amount for cash out is 50Gourds

"The information on this mobile application is provided by Lotto International S.A (‘’LISA’’, ‘’we’’, ‘’us’’ or ‘’our’’). By downloading, accessing, or using LISA’s application or any page of this application, you signify your assent to this disclaimer. The contents of this application, including without limitation, all data, information, text, graphics, links, and other materials are provided as information to our users and are meant to be used for gambling purposes. The application is provided as is without any warranty of any kind, either expressed, implied, or statutory, including, but not limited to, any warranty that the application will conform to specifications, any implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and freedom of infringement, and any warranty that the documentation will conform to the application, or any warranty that the application will be error free . LISA makes no warranty that the application or the content will meet or satisfy your requirements. In no event shall LISA be liable for any damages, or loss of data that results from your use of the application or its content, including but not limited to, direct, indirect, special or consequential damages, arising out of, resulting from, or any way connected with this application, whether or not based upon warranty, contract, or otherwise, whether or not the injury was sustained by persons or property or otherwise and whether or not the loss was sustained from, or arose out of the results of, or use of, the software or services provided hereunder. ©2020 Lotto International S.A All Rights Reserved www.lisa.ht"

"You are solely responsible for keeping your password and other login credentials secured, and for all your purchases activations services requested in other transactions conducted through your registered online account. Any purchases and wallet transactions made using the service shall be deemed legitimate request from the customer whom the online account is registered. You must immediately advise LISA if your account information is compromised or they a reason to believe it is compromised. LISA shall not be responsible for any losses arising out of the unauthorized use of a customer's online account details. You will receive an SMS/test message advising of your registration to use the service and confirmation of each purchase and wallet transaction made using the service. Your LISA wallet allows you transfer and cash out your funds in partnership with MonCash (eMoney) and SogeXpress (Cash). LISA shall not be responsible neither have access to the accounts limits and specs marketed by these two (2) entities. MonCash has two (2) wallets: Mini Wallet (HTG7,500) and Full Wallet (HTG75,000.00). For the number of transactions allowed on each type of wallet, go to the MonCash APP or call 202. SogeXpress has the right to request an ID to anyone doing a transaction in one of their points of payment. Their minimum required amount for cashout is 50 Gourds.
LISA does not guarantee, represent or warrant that your access to the service will be uninterrupted – error- free or operable at all times or during any downtime caused by outages to any public internet backbones, networks or servers, caused by any failures of your applications, equipment, systems or local access services, for previously scheduled maintenance or relating to events beyond LISA’s control such as strikes, riots, insurrection, fires, floods, explosions, war governmental action, labor conditions, earthquakes, natural disasters or interruptions in Internet services to an area where the network servers are located. LISA may change, suspend or discontinue any advantage related to the LISA wallet at any time. LISA may also impose limits on the use of or access to certain features or portions of the service, in any case without notice or liability. You agree not to use any device, software or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the service, or with any other person's use of the service. You may not represent that you are someone else or impersonate any other individual or entity or manipulate information in order to use the service. To complete any wallet transaction, you will be required to give a consent that you have understood the terms of this service. you should not use the service if you do not agree to any of these terms."

Lisa takes your right to privacy seriously. You have the right to know what we do with your personal information collected on the Lisa application so that you can make informed choices. Our commitment to privacy is based upon the protocol of personal privacy. This privacy notice explains what information we collect, why we collect it and how we use it. To enhance your customer experience on Lisa\'s platform through creating an individualized interaction between you and Lisa ; we use data analytics and information contained on your Lisa account including past transactions, your past and real time behavior on the application and similar types of information from other players, to select and deliver content, offers, product recommendations, marketing, advertising and other interactions that are personalized to you. No personal information is collected without your prior consent. We collect your personal information when you voluntarily communicate with us through the application, subscribe to a service or by any other similar means. As part of setting up and or maintaining an account with us, we will ask for personal information like your name, date of birth, gender, language preference, email address, telephone number, address, security question, and other user preferences. when you connect with us through social media channels, you are also subject to policies in place for use of those social media channels, please review the privacy policies of the channels you are using to connect with us. We will retain your information including personal information for as long as is responsibly required to provide you services, to promote our products and services and to operate a gaming business in accordance with our legal obligations; it may also be used to resolve disputes and or enforce any agreement we have with the user. Lisa has security measures in place to attempt to protect against the loss, misuse, alteration of your user data and personal information under our control. Lisa attempts to keep such information in secure facilities, protected from unauthorized access and kept only as long as is reasonably required. We reserve the right to modify this privacy notice at any time so please review it frequently.
LISA covers the MonCash cash out fee as of 250 Gourd
